room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Smoky Mountain Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
room_address: 179 E Wears Valley Rd #24 Pigeon Forge, TN 37863
room_description: Welcome to the Diamond Heist room at Smoky Mountain Escape Games – where the Star of Dreams Diamond has been stolen!  Montgomery Bank & Trust is a known front for money laundering, as well as other criminal activity.  Reliable intel indicates the Star of Dreams is secured somewhere on their premises, presumably under the watchful eye of the bank’s president, Charles Montgomery, III.  Your help is needed to ensure the Star of Dreams Diamond is recovered by its rightful owner! It’s up to you to break into Montgomery’s office, locate his secret vault and confiscate the diamond before he returns.  Enjoy the thrill and excitement of the Smoky Mountain Escape Games Diamond Heist Room.
